doc:
Hope Davis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hope_Davis 0 Hope Davis (born March 23, 1964) is an American actress. She has starred in films such as About Schmidt (2002) and American Splendor (2003). For her role in the original Broadway production of God of Carnage in 2009, she received a Tony Award nomination for Best Actress in a Play. She has also received two Emmy Award nominations, for her 2009 television roles in the series In Treatment and in the film The Special Relationship. In 2016, she appeared in the Marvel Cinematic Universe film Captain America: Civil War as Tony Stark's mother Maria Stark. Hope_Davis ( born March_23_,_1964 ) is an_American_actress . She has_starred in films such_as About Schmidt_(_2002_) and American_Splendor_(_2003_) . For her_role in the_original_Broadway_production of God of Carnage in 2009 , she received a_Tony_Award_nomination for Best_Actress in a_Play . She has_also_received two_Emmy_Award_nominations , for her_2009_television_roles in the_series In Treatment and in the_film The_Special_Relationship . In 2016 , she appeared in the_Marvel_Cinematic_Universe_film_Captain_America : Civil_War as Tony_Stark 's_mother_Maria_Stark .
